name: Finnbar's Bride -- A Pendragon Campfire Tales Entry
name_original: Finnbar's Bride -- A Pendragon Campfire Tales Entry
description:
This is my first ever Ink project! I wrote this micro-story as an entry for Inkle's Pendragon Campfire Stories competition. Although it was not selected, I decided to upload it anyway to share here. Looking forward to playing around with this format in future.

This is an original story inspired by a few Norse and Celtic tales -- I wanted to write something that would not cross over with the Arthurian legends from the game itself, but would be the kind of tale that the knights of the round table might share around the fire on their travels.
